Tap here to view the privacy policy

Introduction

Welcome to The Holy Quran! This Privacy Notice explains how your personal information is collected, used, and protected. By using The Holy Quran, you agree to the terms outlined in this Notice.

Data Collection

Notifications Access: The Holy Quran requests access to notifications to provide personalized updates on remaining time. The Holy Quran does not store any notification content or Personally Identifiable Information (PII) outside your device.

Information Use

Personal Data

The Holy Quran does not collect or store any personal data such as names, email addresses, or phone numbers.

Usage Analytics

The Holy Quran does not track your usage behavior or collect analytics data.

Data Security

On-Device Data Storage

All data used by The Holy Quran remains on your device. The Holy Quran does not transfer or store any data externally.

External Services

Advertisements

The Holy Quran does not display third-party advertisements.

External Links

The Holy Quran may contain links to external websites. Please note that The Holy Quran is not responsible for the privacy practices of these sites.

Children\'s Privacy

The Holy Quran is not intended for children under the age of 13. The Holy Quran does not knowingly collect any information from children.

Changes to This Notice

The Holy Quran may update this Privacy Notice from time to time. Any changes will be reflected in the app and on our website.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Notice, please contact me via email on hifnawy_moniem@hotmail.com

Android Permissions

The Holy Quran does not require any permissions
